entries.label: Mock Student Tuition Portal
entries.description: A site to demonstrate a more streamlined user experiences for making tuition payments.

entries.label: Houston Pickeball Registry
entries.description: A site dedicated to cataloging the pickleball venues of the Houston area.

entries.label: Aquarium Review Site
entries.description: A custom webpage that hosts a map of aquariums in the US with reviews and images.

entries.label: Enchantech 2025 XR Space

entries.label: 3D Squad Tactics Prototype
entries.description: A prototype of a squad based RTS sandbox game with a grid inventory system and complex unit AI.

entries.label: Top-Down Action RPG Prototype
entries.description: A topdown action RPG prototype created in Godot that uses free pixel art assets.

entries.label: Text-based Roguelike Framework
entries.description: A framework for creating traditional roguelike games with ASCII text graphics.
